message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is 50% off the market value. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
I'm not buying, but can I ask, is this product high quality or low quality?

Ahah, I knew you'd be skeptical! But trust me, this product has some... hidden gems. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, and I'll even throw in a special bonus - a personalized thank-you note from me. It's a deal you won't find anywhere else!
I'm not falling for the sales pitch. Can you just tell me whether the product is high-quality or low-quality?
